attributes.additional_details:
the achievement from this gentleman is unprecedented and fully deserves a knighthood  for raising the 14.600.000 for the NHS 

this achievement is what dreams are made of he served his country in WW2 and wears his medals with pride and to knight him would be truly fitting
attributes.background: following the amazing achievement of the fundraising from captain tom moore how fitting would it be to Knight Captain Tom Moore on his 100th birthday

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
